job.title: Software Engineer, Experience
job.description: ltstronggtltugtabout daily harvestltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtdaily harvest makes nourishing food built on fruits and vegetables accessible we do this by delivering thoughtfully sourced chefcrafted food to customers doorsteps all ready to enjoy in minutes were on a mission to take care of food so food can take care of youltbrgtltbrgtour team is collaborative driven and futurethinking were constantly learning experimenting and iterating and celebrate failure just as much as success we take risks try new things and we get things done we love adaptogens and cruciferous vegetables but never say no to cake everything we do we do in the service of our communityltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtposition overviewltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtdaily harvest is looking for a software engineer to join the engineering team the engineering team focuses on architecting developing and delivering highly scalable and innovative software that meets the needs of the daily harvest business and our customersltbrgtltbrgtas a member of our software engineering team youll be part of a team that crafts and ships the code that powers our entire business and enables us to take care of food from userfacing web experiences to code that interfaces with our restful api services youll be joining a team of inspired engineers who enjoy working togetherltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwhat youll doltbrgtltstronggtltulgt ltligtdesign estimate and implement new and refactored software services on the platform securely reliably and at scaleltligt ltligtwork crossfunctionally with product and engineering to contribute to the technical design of projects with major company impactltligt ltligtwork with internal tech teams to help to identify and build platform elements required to support key product featuresltligt ltligteffectively communicate and collaborate with product owners and other members of the digital product team to develop bestofbreed digital experience that meet the needs of our users and drive our business objectivesltligt ltligtidentify and execute on opportunities to improve the software development lifecycle and processesltligt ltbrgtltulgtltstronggtwho you are ltbrgtltstronggtltulgt ltligteducation training or experience equivalent to a bs or higher eg ms or phd in computer science or a related technical field involving coding eg physics or mathematicsltligt ltligt years of professional experience with software developmentltligt ltligtexperience with javascript es css ampamp htmlltligt ltligtexperience delivering production applications using a modern javascript framework such as angularjs or reactltligt ltligtexperience with several of the following redux reduxsaga typescript bootstrap sass storybook jest eslint prettier webpack react nativeltligt ltligtexperience with agile software development and agile software solutions like jira and clubhouseltligt ltligtexperience in automated testing a plusltligt ltligtexperience with python a plusltligt ltligtcontinuous integration and continuous delivery experience preferredltligt ltligtexperience buildingleveraging restful apis and services at scale preferredltligt working hours unlimited pto planltligt ltligtcompetitive medical dental and vision benefits k equity participation ltligt ltligtancillary benefits commuter gym membership citi bike discountsltligt
